subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Stadiums and Arenas
Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Sections in right and left field account for 1,048 bleacher seats where the view is obstructed. Most fans there are upset — no matter how little they paid for their tickets.
snippet: Sections in right and left field account for 1,048 bleacher seats where the view is obstructed. Most fans there are upset — no matter how little they paid for their tickets.
